item.description:
For those of us non-working folks, if the weather forecasters are correct lets go enjoy the fresh powder Thursday afternoon.

So Think and Dream SNOW!!!!!!!!!!!!,
and then Meet INSIDE the Great Brook touring center, at picnic table with meetup sign, Thursday at 12:30AM for a casual fun novice-intermediate ski 1:00-3:00/4:00pm

Midweek Adult Trail Pass, $10
Rental Equipment Available, skis, boots, poles, $13
* But be sure to bring CASH or CHECK, the touring center Does NOT ACCEPT any Credit Cards.

Also Bring plenty of water and lunch/snack for the trail.
item.how_to_find_us: i'll be wearing all blue with a Mont Ste-Anne headband

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Great Brook Ski Thursday
